| icon           = poe2 tahiwa_snapper_icon.png
| description    = The freshwater lakes and rivers of the Deadfire teem with these small, voracious fish. Their name means "razortooth." Schools are known to strip even large animals down to the bone in a matter of minutes. They are easily caught, however, and receive similar treatment from hungry Kith.
